Claim: "Scientists warned that ice gain in the Southern Hemisphere was caused by natural variations and circulations in the atmosphere."
Referring expressions: Scientists, ice gain, Southern Hemisphere, atmosphere.  Climate change, isn't occurring
Properties: IsWarned(a),  IsCausedBy(b),  IsIn(c),  IsIn(d)  IsOccurring(e),  Isn'tOccurring(f)
Formula: (exists c (exists b (exists a (IsWarned(a) and (IsCausedBy(b) and IsIn(c)))))) -> (exists f (exists e (Isn'tOccurring(f) and ~IsOccurring(e))))
